>
[Finned Ridges](/Feats.aspx?ID=2520) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The ridges and flaps of your skin steer you through the water. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet.
